Text: Careful FLAC fans. While this was listed under the FLAC category, these files are all MP3.
You forgive me to grab wrong format ...

Why would you put this into a giant ISO file ??
Nobody does that!!

Fortunately I have all of these in lossless.

It's their 2008 CD "Quid Pro Quo" and their new release Bula Quo!  that I need in M4a format.

Neither album is included here anyway.
